lead_paragraph: Adam Gase's introductory news conference as Miami Dolphins coach wrapped up an hour before the NFL playoffs began Saturday, and the goal going forward was clear.

headline.print_headline: Bears Coordinator Adam Gase Hired as Dolphins Coach
headline.main: Bears Coordinator Adam Gase Hired as Dolphins Coach
